articles.title: Congratulations to Indian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Indian President
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Friday sent a congratulatory message to Ram Nath Kovind on his election as president of the Republic of India.
					 Kim in the message wished the Indian president big success in his responsible work to build a powerful and prosperous country, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would strengthen in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Delegation of WPK Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of WPK Back Home
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) led by Ryu Myong Son, vice department director of its Central Committee, returned home on Saturday after participating in the 14th Congress of the South African Communist Party and visiting Mozambique and Iran.

articles.title: DPRK Friendship Medal Conferred on Russians
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship Medal Conferred on Russians
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK friendship medal was conferred on Russian personages.
					 The medals were awarded to Karpov, president of the Federation of International Peace Fund who is deputy to the State Duma, Alexandr Zhevin, chief of the Korean Affairs Study Center of the Institute of the Far East of the Russian Academy of Sciences, and Duvinski, president of the Council of Moscow Peace Fund.
					
					 An event for conferring the medal took place in Moscow on July 17.
					
					 Present there were figures of the Russian government, political parties, organizations and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at FAI Contests
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at FAI Contests
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 2017 FAI Contests held in Ulan Bator.
					 So Myong Bom came first at the medium and big glider individuals of the FAI Asian Cup 2017 for Free Flight Model Aircraft held on July 14 and 15.
					
					 Kim Un Bok finished second at the middle glider individual.
					
					 Kim Un Bok, So Myong Bom and Kim Song Il respectively came first, second and third at the big glider individual of the FAI Sodnombaljir's memorial Cup 2017 on July 16.
					
					 Those players returned home on Saturday.

articles.title: Campaign for Creating Dense Pine-nut Tree Forests
articles.content:
Campaign for Creating Dense Pine-nut Tree Forests
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Forest Science under the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection in the DPRK recently completed the technology for creating dense forest of high-yielding pine-nut trees and pushes ahead with its introduction into different parts of the country.
					 The new technology advances the harvest by eight or ten years with higher yield per hectare in dense forests, as compared with forests of pine-nut trees grown from seeds.
					
					 It has been well proved by a dense high-yielding pine-nut tree forest created in a mountainous area of Rinsan County, North Hwanghae Province.
					
					 Pint-nut tree forests in different mountainous areas, including Yonthan, Phyongsan, Sohung and Junghwa counties of North Hwanghae Province, Unsan County of North Phyongan Province, Wonsan City of Kangwon Province and Kangso District of Nampho City, have been turned into those of high-yielding pine-nut trees by means of bud-grafting, producing 1.5 times more pine nuts than before.
					
					 Meanwhile, with the establishment of bases for cultivating and supplying pine-nut saplings in large quantities in ten-odd cities and counties, it has been pushed forward to turn the existing pine-nut tree forests into dense forests of high-yielding pine-nut trees in Songwon County of Jagang Province and other parts of the country.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lashes Out at Pressure for S. Korea-U.S. Renegotiation over FTA
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lashes Out at Pressure for S. Korea-U.S. Renegotiation over FTA
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is pressurizing south Korea into gangster-like renegotiations over the "Free Trade Agreement" for its own profits. 
					 Recently Trump let the U.S. trade mission unilaterally notify the south Korean authorities that it would get into procedures for the renegotiations over FTA.
					
					 This shows the true colors of brazen-faced gangster U.S. as it does not care for the destiny of its colonial servant for its own interests.
					
					 Now the economy of south Korea has been reduced to economy of extreme deformity and partiality owing to the U.S. colonial economic policy for over seven decades.
					
					 After the military occupation of south Korea, the U.S. gripped all economic arteries of south Korea under the control of the Japanese imperialists, claiming they were "enemy properties," and reduced the south Korean economy into dependent, colonial and subcontract one by every means and method such as "aid," loan, direct investment and market opening serving the interests of the U.S. economy.
					
					 At present the U.S. moves to control the south Korean economy find their most striking manifestation in signing FTA.
					
					 The south Korea-U.S. FTA signed by the U.S. by forcing traitor Lee Myung Bak is the unequal and shackling one as seven articles of FTA stipulate commitments of the U.S. while 55 articles for south Korea.
					
					 During the Park Geun Hye's office the U.S. forced south Korea to fling open its market, import more American beef and fully open its rice market, the only one in grain market of south Korea, claiming that the U.S. suffered more losses than south Korea after the signing of FTA.
					
					 Now south Korea depends 87-100 percent of raw materials and fuel necessary for industrial production, 70 percent of spare parts and other materials, core and source technology for production, on the U.S. and outsiders. 
					
					 American multinational capitals infiltrated into south Korea in various forms and methods like direct or indirect investment, loan, technology cooperation and joint bank to get colonial excess profit, enjoying all kinds of privileges from south Korea.
					
					 They become the biggest stockholders having 40-80 percent of stocks of trade banks and main business groups which are the backbone of the south Korean economy and control the whole economy including fund oversight, equipment investment, production and employment. Every year the U.S. gets more than five billion U.S. dollars from south Korea in the name of dividend alone. 
					
					 It is due to amend the unequal articles which are unilaterally profitable for the U.S.
					
					 However, the south Korean authorities are looked down, keeping mum at the U.S. arbitrary brigandish demand.
					
					 The south Korean people can never be free from the poor position as colonial slave and evade disgrace, misfortunes and sufferings as long as the U.S. economic domination and sycophantic and humiliating acts of the south Korean authorities are allowed to go on.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities represent the mindset of the candlelight demonstrators, they should resolutely break with the pro-U.S. sycophantic and servile policy after recovering their senses, before it is too late.

articles.title: Successful Test- Launch of Hwasong-14 Is Great Victory of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Successful Test- Launch of Hwasong-14 Is Great Victory of DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article that the successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-14 is the brilliant victory won by Juche Korea in the several decades-long showdown with the U.S.
					 This is also an event to be specially recorded in 5,000-year long history of the nation as it fundamentally changed the strategic position of the DPRK and world political structure, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The greatest desire of the nation which remained a mere dream has been realized in the era of the Workers' Party at last.
					
					 Today's brilliant victory represents the precious outcome of the tireless revolutionary leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who regards it as his lifelong mission to successfully carry forward the great cause of building a nuclear force desired by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, pioneer and builder of the Juche-oriented rocket industry.
					
					 The DPRK's defence scientists drew great strength, wisdom and persevering will from the outstanding wisdom and guidance of Kim Jong Un, the most illustrious commander. They performed such miracle as reaching the highest level of boosting the national nuclear force through the perfection of ICBM of Juche Korea, the powerful strategic weapon system of the WPK.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK remain unchanged in their will not to flinch even an inch from the road of boosting their nuclear force as long as the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat to the latter are not fundamentally removed.
					
					 They will steadily stockpile the arsenal of Juche Korea in quality and quantity under the uplifted banner of "Forward in the do-or-die battle for the country and people!" until the U.S. and its vassal forces show the white flag to them.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Lawmakers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Lawmakers
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the puppet lawmakers of south Korea cooked up a "resolution," the keynote of which faults the DPRK's test-launch of inter-continental ballistic rocket Hwasong-14. The political imposters ridiculously talked about any "resentment" and "warning", going reckless in adopting the "resolution".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary slams this as the last-ditch efforts of those who are scared off by the tremendous nuclear force and bright future of the DPRK and as a foolish action taking advantage of the U.S. sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary says:
					
					 The adoption of "resolution" is no more than a futile endeavor in fair weather prepare for foul.
					
					 Nothing is more serious miscalculation than to assert that they can prevent the road chosen by the army and people of the DPRK with the adoption of "resolution" which is no more than tongue-lashing. The puppet national assembly left another blot in the history as it unhesitatingly conducted provocative acts of pulling up the DPRK's measure for bolstering up nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 There can be no such anti-reunification "national assembly" as it deters the nation's reconciliation and unity and builds up distrust and confrontation.
					
					 The political philistines of the NA should clearly understand that their malignant assertions and foolish actions would only precipitate their miserable end.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Wiping out Conservative Group of S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Wiping out Conservative Group of S. Korea
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the remnants of the Park Geun Hye group more dead than alive set up the "Korean Patriotic Party" talking about the "value of conservatism" and the "new rightwing political party".
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this a cynical ploy to cover up their crimes of turning south Korea into a veritable hell and steadily bind the present regime in sycophancy toward the U.S. and the policy of confrontation with compatriots in the north.
					
					 It is absolutely unpardonable that the accomplices who should be buried in the cemetery of history together with traitor Park Geun Hye are still going scot-free, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The conservative group, wastes of the era, should be thoroughly buried and completely eliminated from the arena of history.
					
					 No matter how often the conservative group vociferates "innovations" and "revamp", they can never change their true colors as quislings.
					
					 The group has mercilessly trampled down the right to existence and dignity of the people, holding privileged positions in politics, economy, culture, military and all other fields with dependence on outside forces. If this group is left at large in south Korea, it will be hard to overturn the corrupt political landscape and it is impossible for the people to get rid of disgrace and sufferings, misfortune and pain.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Urges Authorities to Set Free Prisoners of Conscience
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Urges Authorities to Set Free Prisoners of Conscience
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People carried an editorial on July 19 demanding the release of the prisoners of conscience.
					 The editorial said that there are many prisoners of conscience in jails of south Korea detained during the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes.
					
					 It stressed that the release of the prisoners of conscience would be the first touchstone proving what will for democracy the present "government" has, though it came to power due to candlelight demonstrations.
					
					 The editorial demanded that the "government" come out to set free the prisoners of conscience, though belatedly.

articles.title: Pusan City of S. Korea Seriously Polluted by U.S. Troops
articles.content:
Pusan City of S. Korea Seriously Polluted by U.S. Troops
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Pusanjin District, Pusan City of south Korea where the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops were stationed has been seriously polluted, according to the south Korean paper Hangyore on July 18.
					 According to the findings of survey conducted by the south Korean authorities and the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in 2006, half of the area was seriously contaminated by 13 fuel oil and heavy metal substances surpassing the tolerance limit.
					
					 In 2011, 8 more poisonous substances excelling the tolerance limit were found in the area.

articles.title: Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Koreans in Japan Held
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan was held at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on July 20 to mark the fifth anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's congratulatory message to the participants in the conference of chapter officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, officials of the Central Committee of Chongryon, leading officials of central organizations and businesses, chairmen of Chongryon chapters and officials of Chongryon in Kanto.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in his report at the meeting said that the message Kim Jong Un sent to the participants in the conference of officials of Chongryon chapters on July 20, Juche 101 (2012) serves as the encyclopedic guidelines which shows the strategic goals and tasks of the Korean movement in Japan and as an ever-victorious weapon which gives deep love and great strength and courage to the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 He called for glorifying significant this year as a year of turning point to be recorded in history and conducting a dynamic general offensive toward the 24th Congress of Chongryon to be a new milestone in the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Remembered by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Remembered by Foreign Figures
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings were held in the Czech Republic, Germany, Spain, Myanmar, India, Thailand, Sri Lanka and Indonesia between July 1 and 8 to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said that Korean socialism could advance victoriously despite any ordeals, thanks to the party, state and army built by the President and to his titanic feats and firm foundations laid by him.
					
					 The chairperson of the German Communist Party and the chief of the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture noted that the President founded the Juche idea, the guiding idea in the era of independence and clearly indicated the way for accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 The secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar praised the President for having achieved the single-minded unity of the whole society with his benevolent politics and pushed forward socialist construction, foiling every challenge of the imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies said it would have been unthinkable without the President's leadership that the DPRK could proudly rank itself among world powers.
					
					 The vice-chairperson of the Thai Committee for Remembering HE President Kim Il Sung said that the President was the greatest man who gave positive support to the struggle of peoples of countries aspiring after independence.
					
					 Messages to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings in the Czech Republic and Germany.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded in Russia
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Special write-ups were posted on websites of Russia from July 3 to 8 to commemorate the 23rd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. They were accompanied with portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and his photos.
					 An article titled "Benevolent Image of Comrade Kim Il Sung", posted on website Patrioti Moskva, said:
					
					 When remembering Comrade Kim Il Sung, a broad smile on his face came first to the mind of the people.
					
					 It was his special flavor as a great man that he had always treated the people with a broad smile on his face and took care of them with paternal affection.
					
					 An article "Comrade Kim Il Sung, Father of the Korean People", posted on Grifon-personal, said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung was a tender-hearted father responsible for the destiny of the people, rather than the leader of a country.
					
					 With the transparent outlook on posterity, he had spared nothing for the children.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Urge U.S. to Hands Off Korea
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Urge U.S. to Hands Off Korea
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Gathering 2017-Praise to the Great Persons of Mt Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea urged the U.S. to take its hands off Korea, in their joint statement issued on July 2 on the occasion of June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Noting that organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in different countries have conducted various solidarity activities every year on the occasion of the month of anti-U.S. joint struggle, the statement said:
					
					 The atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean people are criminal acts against humanity that deserve retaliation and punishment.
					
					 The Trump administration of the U.S. schemes to commit another horrible crime against the Korean people by igniting a war of aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The UNSC must withdraw the criminal and illegal "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK at once and the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces should stop their nuclear war drills.

articles.title: Bulgarian and Brazilian Papers Denounce U.S. Moves
articles.content:
Bulgarian and Brazilian Papers Denounce U.S. Moves
Pyongyang, July 22 (KCNA) -- Bulgarian and Brazilian papers carried articles on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The Bulgarian paper Iskra said:
					
					 The end of World War II gave freedom and independence to many countries but imposed the tragedy of division upon the Korean people. 
					
					 Korea was liberated but divided into the north and the south by foreign forces.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists provoked a war of aggression against the DPRK on June 25, 1950, with the wild ambition to dominate the whole of Korea.
					
					 Tens of thousands of U.S. troops are still stationed in south Korea to exercise real power there.
					
					 The chief executive of south Korea is just a puppet of the U.S.
					
					 It cannot but be a tragedy that Korea was divided in the interests of foreign forces.
					
					 Nevertheless, south Korea has continued to conduct large-scale war maneuvers against the DPRK with the U.S.
					
					 The Brazilian paper Inverta cited concrete facts to disclose the brutal atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists in the past Korean War.
					
					 The paper noted that the DPRK is bolstering up its nuclear deterrence self-defence in every way to cope with the U.S. moves for a new war and nuclear threat.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de la India
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente electo de la India
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion a Ram Nath Kovind por su eleccion como presidente de la Republica de la India.
					Convencido de que las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de dos paises, el remitente formulo votos sinceros por mayores exitos en las tareas responsables del destinatario para construir una India poderosa y prospera.

articles.title: Concedida medalla de amistad a personalidades rusas
articles.content:
Concedida medalla de amistad a personalidades rusas
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Quedaron otorgadas las medallas de amistad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a Karpov, disputado de la Duma Estatal y presidente de la Federacion del Fondo Internacional por la Paz, Alexandr Zhevin, jefe del Centro de Estudio de Asuntos Coreanos del Instituto del Extremo Oriente de la Academia de Ciencias, y Duvinski, presidente del Consejo del Fondo por la Paz de Moscu.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en Moscu la ceremonia de otorgamiento.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes las personalidades del gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de Rusia y el embajador y otros miembros de la embajada coreana en ese pais.

articles.title: Hay que separarse de la politica sumisa a EE.UU.: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Hay que separarse de la politica sumisa a EE.UU.: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos esta imponiendo al Sur de Corea las renegociaciones para modificar su conveniencia el "Tratado de Libre Comercio" con el Sur de Corea.
					Trump hizo a la Representacion de Comercio de EE.UU. informar unilateralmente a las autoridades surcoreanas el inicio del procedimiento de renegociaciones del TLC.
					
					Este hecho muestra la naturaleza cinica y gangsteril del imperio americano que para los intereses propios, no vacila en sacrificar al lacayo colonial.
					
					La actual economia surcoreana, muy desequilibrada y parcial, es el producto de la politica economica de EE.UU. sobre su colonia practicada durante mas de 70 anos.
					
					Despues de la ocupacion militar del suelo surcoreano, EE.UU. se apodero de las arterias de la economia surcoreana, que estaba en manos del imperialismo japones, con el pretexto de confiscacion de los "bienes enemigos".
					
					Usando todos los medios y metodos como "ayuda", prestamo, inversion directa y apertura del mercado, convirtio la economia surcoreana en la dependiente y colonial que funciona como maquinaria lucrativa de la economia norteamericana.
					
					En la actualidad, las tentativas de EE.UU. de controlar la economia surcoreana se manifiestan con mas claridad en la firma del "Tratado de Libre Comercio".
					
					El "TLC", fabricado por EE.UU. obligando al traidor Lee Myung Bak, tiene 7 articulos de compromisos para EE.UU. mientras los otros 55 son obligaciones del Sur de Corea. Durante el mandato de Park Geun-hye, EE.UU. insistio en que sufre grandes perdidas despues de la firma del "TLC" y exigio al Sur de Corea dejar mas abierto el mercado de generos, importar mucho mas carne de res norteamericana y abrir totalmente el mercado de arroz, el unico que se mantenia entre los mercados de cereales.
					
					Ahora, el Sur de Corea depende de EE.UU. y otros paises el 87~100% de materias primas y combustibles necesarios a la produccion industrial, el 70% de accesorios y materiales y el 100% de las tecnologias medulares y originales para la produccion.
					
					Los capitales multinacionales de origen estadounidense se infiltran en el Sur de Corea de diversas formas y metodos como la inversion directa e indirecta, prestamo, cooperacion tecnica, banco comanditario, etc. y sacan superganancias aprovechando las prerrogativas de toda indole otorgadas por los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Siendo maximo accionista que tiene 40%~80% de las acciones de los bancos comerciales y grandes empresas que forman la columna vertebral de la economia surcoreana, controlan la economia total del Sur de Corea en los dominios de la administracion monetaria, la inversion de equipos, la produccion, el empleo, etc. y ganan anualmente mas de 5 mil millones de dolares por el concepto de dividendo.
					
					Si hay que modificar el "tratado", deberia enmendar los articulos desiguales que favorecen unicamente a EE.UU.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas sufren la injuria sin hacer ninguna objecion a la demanda bandidesca de EE.UU.
					
					Mientras prosigan la dominacion economica de EE.UU. y los actos serviles a grandes potencias de las autoridades surcoreanas, el pueblo surcoreano no podra salir nunca de su miserable destino de esclavo colonial ni evitar la verguenza, desgracia y dolor.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas, que supuestamente representan la opinion publica reflejada en velas encendidas, deben separarse con audacia de la politica sumisa y servil al imperio americano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun advierte a la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun advierte a la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 22 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, los parlamentarios de la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea fabricaron el "proyecto de resolucion" acusando el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico intercontinental "Hwasong-14" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Los politiqueros recurrieron con frenesi a la aprobacion del "proyecto de resolucion" soltando las locuras tales como "indignacion" y "advertencia".
					
					Esto deviene el ultimo esfuerzo de los atemorizados por el inagotable poderio nuclear y el futuro prometedor de la RPDC y constituye una locura que se adhiere a la campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este sabado y prosigue:
					
					Ademas, la aprobacion del "proyecto de resolucion" de la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea no pasa de ser el malgasto de esfuerzos.
					
					Resulta una gran equivocacion si ellos piensan en que con tal farsa pueden impedir el camino optado por el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Al perpetrar el acto provocativo cuestionando la justa medida por fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC, la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea escribira otra pagina vergonzosa de la historia.
					
					Es innecesaria la "Asamblea Nacional" anti-reunificacion que impide la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion coreana y fomenta la desconfianza y la confrontacion.
					
					Los pobres parlamentarios del Sur de Corea deben conocer exactamente que su imprudencia adelantara su fin tragico.
